name: Falling Leaf - Tree Adventure
description:
Falling Leaf - Tree Adventure
is an awesome little game that turns a bit of basic physics into an incredible amount of fun! With adorable graphics and sounds, Green The Tree brings into your hands the quest of a determined little Tree who must make it to the safety of a pail of water while avoiding nasty, though equally cute odds.

Collect stars and beat your own previously set records as you help the little tree escape eminent explosion at the prickles of mean smirking cacti. Face new challenging levels while employing quick thinking and a variety of skills that keep enhancing as the game progresses. Never has physics been this enjoyable. Hours and hours of fun.
enjoy!!!!!
